summary: Changes General Tullius\' appearance to closer resemble voice actor Michael Hogan.
descriptionHtml:
Changes General Tullius\' appearance to closer resemble voice actor Michael Hogan.
I\'m still trying to make an optional esp that lets Tullius use Ceekay9\'s bandit eyepatch, but I haven\'t been able to get it to work. I would appreciate any advice.

0.4
Some minor edits. Changed hair and eye color, removed facial hair. Realized I left out a gods damned texture file. Frakkin\' toasters.

0.3
Fixes Civil War endings to use the new face as well.

0.2
I think I figured out the coloring issue. 
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/555629-discolored-head/
a google always helps :D
Let me know if there are any issues.

0.1
I didn\'t change much of his coloring except the purplish eyeshadow that vanilla Tullius had, but he still turned out kinda grayfaced . . . if anyone knows how to fix that let me know!
author: backstept

files.name: TulliusHoganV4
files.changelogHtml:
Minor edits to refine the likeness.
Missing facetint maps found and included.
